name: North Firth
role_in_state: Northern gateway for convoys and refit services
economy_niches: timber yards for masts and spars
culture_adjustments: denser clan-harbor kinship concentrated in small coves
rituals focused on immediate voyage safety and hull blessing
oral seamanship lore outweighs formal guild records
constraints: reliant on imported reagents; humidity complicates storage
notes: preferred site for sea-trialing experimental hulls
strategically important for long-distance convoy staging
